MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA3 Croft area of Warrington affecting properties in Gosling Road, Eaves Brow Road, Wadeson Way and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:32am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:19am on 26th January 2021
